(ROOT
  (S
    (NP (DT This) (NN post))
    (VP (VBD was)
      (VP (VBN brought)
        (PP (TO to)
          (NP (PRP you)))
        (PP (IN by)
          (NP
            (NP (NNP Grand) (NNP Park) (NNP Kunming))
            (SBAR
              (S
                (NP (EX There))
                (VP (VBZ is)
                  (ADVP (RB just))
                  (NP (DT no) (JJR better) (NN place)
                    (S
                      (VP (TO to)
                        (VP (VB learn)
                          (PP (IN about)
                            (NP
                              (NP (DT a) (NN city) (POS 's))
                              (NN food) (NN culture)
                              (S (RB then)
                                (VP (TO to)
                                  (VP (VB visit)
                                    (NP (PRP$ its) (NN food) (NNS streets))
                                    (PP (IN at)
                                      (NP (NN night)))))))))))))))))))
    (. .)))


det(post-2, This-1)
nsubjpass(brought-4, post-2)
auxpass(brought-4, was-3)
root(ROOT-0, brought-4)
prep(brought-4, to-5)
pobj(to-5, you-6)
prep(brought-4, by-7)
nn(Kunming-10, Grand-8)
nn(Kunming-10, Park-9)
pobj(by-7, Kunming-10)
expl(is-12, There-11)
rcmod(Kunming-10, is-12)
advmod(is-12, just-13)
det(place-16, no-14)
amod(place-16, better-15)
nsubj(is-12, place-16)
aux(learn-18, to-17)
infmod(place-16, learn-18)
prep(learn-18, about-19)
det(city-21, a-20)
poss(culture-24, city-21)
possessive(city-21, 's-22)
nn(culture-24, food-23)
pobj(about-19, culture-24)
advmod(visit-27, then-25)
aux(visit-27, to-26)
infmod(culture-24, visit-27)
poss(streets-30, its-28)
nn(streets-30, food-29)
dobj(visit-27, streets-30)
prep(visit-27, at-31)
pobj(at-31, night-32)

    (S
      (NP (EX there))
      (VP (VBP are)
        (NP
          (NP (JJ many) (JJ popular) (JJ touristy) (NN food) (NNS streets))
          (PP (IN in)
            (NP (NNP Kunming)))))
      (, ,))))

    (NP (PRP I))

                (NP (PRP it))
                (ADVP (RB really))
                (VP (VBZ is) (RB n't)

        (VP (TO to)

  (S
    (S
      (NP (DT The) (NN waitress))

          (VP (VB put)
            (NP (PDT all) (DT the) (NNS mushrooms))
            (PP (IN into)

          (VP (VB start)

              (NP (DT the) (JJ rectangular) (NN block))
              (PP (IN of)
                (NP (NN tea))))
            (PP (IN on)
              (NP (DT the) (NN left)))
            (SBAR (IN because)
              (S
                (NP (PRP we))
                (VP (VBD were)
                  (VP (VBN told)
                    (SBAR (IN that)
                      (S
                        (NP (PRP they))
                        (VP (VBD were)
                          (VP (VBN made)
                            (PP (IN from)
                              (NP (NN tea) (NNS buds))))))))))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VBP have)
        (VP (VBN been)
          (VP (VBN aged)
            (PP (IN for)
              (NP (CD 18) (NNS years)))))))
    (. .)))

        (NP
          (NP (CD 300) (NNS rooms))
          (CC and)
          (NP (NNS suites)))
        (CC and)
        (NP
          (NP (NN meeting) (NNS spaces))
          (PP (IN for)
            (NP
              (QP (IN over) (CD 350))
              (NNS people))))))
    (, ,)))


root(ROOT-0, With-1)
num(rooms-3, 300-2)
pobj(With-1, rooms-3)
cc(rooms-3, and-4)
conj(rooms-3, suites-5)
cc(rooms-3, and-6)
nn(spaces-8, meeting-7)
conj(rooms-3, spaces-8)
prep(spaces-8, for-9)
quantmod(350-11, over-10)
num(people-12, 350-11)
pobj(for-9, people-12)

        (NP

      (VP (VB choose)

              (NP (PRP$ your) (JJ memorable) (NN photo))
              (PP (IN with)
                (NP (PRP$ your) (NN entry)))))))
      (CC and)
      (VP (VB stand)
        (S
          (VP (TO to)
            (VP (VB win)

                (NP (DT an) (JJ additional)

                (PP (IN in)
                  (NP (NN cash)))))))))
    (. .)))
